import React from 'react' import './styles.scss' import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react' import Title from '../../components/Title' import Text from '../../components/Text' import Button from '../../components/Button' import 'swiper/swiper.scss' import 'swiper/components/navigation/navigation.scss' import 'swiper/components/pagination/pagination.scss' import 'swiper/components/scrollbar/scrollbar.scss' import map from '../../assets/static/divisions/marathon-soluciones-lighting-es-MX.png' import banner from '../../assets/static/divisions/banner.jpg' import img1 from '../../assets/static/brands/beghelli-marathongroup.png' import img2 from '../../assets/static/brands/dialight-marathonweb.png' import img3 from '../../assets/static/brands/luceco-marathongroup.png' import img4 from '../../assets/static/brands/killark-marathongroup.png' const divisions = () => { return (
Iluminación Disponemos de múltiples opciones en iluminación industrial, comercial y residencial; así como generación de energía fotovoltaica.
Aplicaciones
) } export default divisions
